definition: To make a conscious effort or strive towards achieving a particular goal or outcome, often involving putting in extra time, energy, or dedication. It is commonly used to describe the act of exerting oneself or going the extra mile in order to accomplish something.

examples.german: Ich bemühe mich, pünktlich zu sein.
examples.english: I make an effort to be on time.

examples.german: Er bemüht sich um eine Lösung.
Sie bemüht sich, Deutsch zu lernen.
examples.english: She makes an effort to learn German.

examples.german: Wir bemühen uns um eine gute Zusammenarbeit.
examples.english: We endeavor to have a good cooperation.

examples.german: Die Firma bemüht sich um Kundenzufriedenheit.
examples.english: The company strives for customer satisfaction.
